pr_title: Fix Classpath resource schema resolver to handle pdl resources.

timeline.message: Fix ClassPath resource schema resolver to handle pdl resources.

timeline.bodyText: I suggest you move this field and its corresponding setter near the top of the inner class. It would be easier to read.
timeline.author: evanw555

timeline.bodyText: This class no longer extends DefaultDataSchemaResolver. Are you sure you're not removing any default functionality it had before?
timeline.author: evanw555
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -33,61 +34,106 @@
  *
  * @author Min Chen
  */
-public class ClasspathResourceDataSchemaResolver extends DefaultDataSchemaResolver

replies.bodyText: Since this delegates to the SingleFormat resolver (inner class) which extends the Default resolver, there shouldn't be any regression.
replies.author: karthikbalasub

replies.bodyText: Ah, that's right. It's interesting how the relationship of the multi-format resolvers with the default resolver logic is more "has-a" than "is-a". Reminds me of CS class...
replies.author: evanw555

timeline.bodyText: How is this different from current MultiFormatDataSchemaResolver (https://github.com/linkedin/rest.li/blob/master/data/src/main/java/com/linkedin/data/schema/resolver/MultiFormatDataSchemaResolver.java)?
timeline.author: mchen07

replies.bodyText: Based on my understanding, he wanted to add similar logic to ClasspathResourceDataSchemaResolver, so it makes more sense to add the shared logic in a common abstract class.
replies.author: evanw555

replies.bodyText:
Correct, refactored the existing resolver to extract the common logic to abstract class. Forgot to make it abstract, will do it.
The existing multi-format resolver is the file based one.
replies.author: karthikbalasub

replies.bodyText: Never mind, I found out when I read through to the end.
replies.author: mchen07

timeline.bodyText: why do we need this setter exposed? Should constructor handle this automatically?
timeline.author: mchen07

replies.bodyText: Fixed, this was remnant of an alternate implementation I started with. Cleaned it now.

timeline.bodyText: I may prefer that we make this final, and initialized in constructor and hide setter for this.
